amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-511 to add a provision to the required report to also include the impact that the border crisis has had on law enforcement recruitment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the D'Esposito amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the D'Esposito amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
